description.lang: The Z-Wave.Me Key Fob is a mobile Z-Wave device that can both control other Z-Wave devices and activate predefined scenes in an IP gateway. The Key Fob can be used in five different modes:1)Direct Control of associated Devices with single Buttons 2)Direct Control of associated Devices with two Buttons 3)Scene Activation in IP Gateway 4)Direct Activation of preconfigured Scenes 5)Direct Control of Devices in proximity
